instructions.sl.utf8: Pazljivo preberite vsako izjavo. Če se z izjavo strinjate, obkljukajte ustrezno polje.
instructions.en.utf8: Read each statement carefully. If you agree with the statement, than tick the appropriate checkbox.

question.sl.utf8: Znam povedati podatke o sebi (npr. naslov, tel. številka, starost, država, družina, hobiji).
question.en.utf8: I can give personal information about myself (address, telephone number, nationality, age, family, and hobbies).

question.sl.utf8: Opisati znam, kje stanujem.
question.en.utf8: I can describe where I live.

question.sl.utf8: Na enostaven način znam govoriti o stvareh in osebah iz svojega neposrednega okolja.
question.en.utf8: Using simple words I can talk about things and persons from my direct environment.

question.sl.utf8: Na enostaven način znam opisati, kaj počnem v šoli in prostem času.
question.en.utf8: I can describe what I do at school and in my free time.

question.sl.utf8: Na enostaven način znam opisati kraj, ki ga poznam.
question.en.utf8: Using simple words I can describe the place I know.

question.sl.utf8: V javnosti znam pozdraviti goste, če sem se na to pripravil.
question.en.utf8: In public, I can greet the quests if I have prepared the sentences before.

question.sl.utf8: Znam opisati sebe, svojo družino in druge ljudi.
question.en.utf8: I can describe myself, my family and other people.

question.sl.utf8: Znam podrobneje opisati, kje živim.
question.en.utf8: I can describe in detail where I live.

question.sl.utf8: Znam na kratko in enostavno opisati dogodke.
question.en.utf8: I can give short, basic descriptions of events.

question.sl.utf8: Na preprost način znam opisati svoje hobije.
question.en.utf8: I can describe my hobbies and interests in a simple way.

question.sl.utf8: Znam opisati minule dogodke (npr. zadnji konec tedna, lanske počitnice) in osebne izkušnje.
question.en.utf8: I can describe past actions and personal experience (e.g. the last weekend, my last holidays).

question.sl.utf8: Znam opisati svojo do zdaj pridobljeno izobrazbo in (počitniško) delo, ki sem ga nazadnje opravljal.
question.en.utf8: I can describe my educational background and my present or most recent (holiday) job.

question.sl.utf8: Znam pripovedovati zgodbe z znanim besediščem.
question.en.utf8: I can narrate a story by using the known vocabulary.

question.sl.utf8: Dokaj natančno znam poročati o izkušnjah in opisati svoja občutja in svoje odzive.
question.en.utf8: I can give detailed accounts of experiences, describing feelings and reactions.

question.sl.utf8: Znam razložiti in utemeljiti svoje načrte, odločitve in svoja dejanja.
question.en.utf8: I can explain and give reasons for my plans, intentions and actions.

question.sl.utf8: Znam obnoviti vsebino filma ali knjige in opisati svoje odzive.
question.en.utf8: I can relate the plot of a book or film and describe my reactions.

question.sl.utf8: Znam poenostavljeno obnoviti pisne odlomke, če lahko uporabim besedišče in zaporedje iz izvirnika.
question.en.utf8: I can paraphrase short written passages orally in a simple fashion, using the original text wording and order.

question.sl.utf8: Jasno in podrobno znam opisati številne teme s svojega interesnega področja in tudi poročati o njih.
question.en.utf8: I can give clear, detailed descriptions on a wide range of subjects related to my fields of interest.

question.sl.utf8: Ustno znam povzeti krajše odlomke novic, intervjujev ali dokumentarnih oddaj, v katerih se pojavljajo določena mnenja, določeni argumenti in določene razprave.
question.en.utf8: I can understand and summarise orally short extracts from news items, interviews or documentaries containing opinions, argument and discussion.

question.sl.utf8: Ustno znam povzeti zgodbo in zaporedje dogodkov iz odlomkov filmov ali gledaliških iger.
question.en.utf8: I can understand and summarise orally the plot and sequence of events in an extract from a film or play.

question.sl.utf8: Svoje misli znam logično povezovati in argumentirati.
question.en.utf8: I can construct a chain of reasoned argument, linking my ideas logically.

question.sl.utf8: Znam razložiti svoje gledanje na določen problem in podati prednosti ter pomanjkljivosti raznih možnosti.
question.en.utf8: I can explain a viewpoint on a topical issue giving the advantages and disadvantages of various options.

question.sl.utf8: Znam izražati domneve o vzrokih in posledicah ter se pogovarjati o mogočih situacijah.
question.en.utf8: I can speculate about causes, consequences, and hypothetical situations.

question.sl.utf8: Znam jezikovno jasno in natančno opisati zapleteno problematiko.
question.en.utf8: I can give clear, detailed descriptions of complex subjects.

question.sl.utf8: Znam sestaviti ustni povzetek daljšega, zahtevnega besedila.
question.en.utf8: I can orally summarise long, demanding texts.

question.sl.utf8: Znam ustno podati obširen opis ali obširno poročilo, pri čemer je treba smiselno povezati teme, razviti določena stališča in podati primeren sklep.
question.en.utf8: I can present orally a comprehensive description or report, integrating themes, developing particular points and rounding off with an appropriate conclusion.

question.sl.utf8: Tudi brez pisne predloge znam jasno predstaviti problematiko z osebnega ali s strokovnega področja, in spontano odgovarjati na vprašanja poslušalcev.
question.en.utf8: I can give a clearly developed presentation on a subject in my fields of personal or professional interest, departing when necessary from the prepared text and following up spontaneously points raised by members of the audience.

question.sl.utf8: Razumem podatke iz različnih virov in znam dejstva in utemeljitve preoblikovati ter povezati v jasno, sklenjeno ustno predstavitev.
question.en.utf8: I can understand and summarise orally information from different sources, reconstructing arguments and accounts in a coherent presentation of the overall result.

question.sl.utf8: Preoblikovati znam misli in stališča ter pri tem tudi kaj poudariti, pomensko opredeliti in se izogniti nesporazumom.
question.en.utf8: I can present ideas and viewpoints in a very flexible manner in order to give emphasis, to differentiate and to eliminate ambiguity.
